pages.text: $(li)The Flower Forest is a pretty biome with a good variety of flowers and trees.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can see Wisteria, Oak, Birch and Maple Trees.

$(li)Flowers such as Tall Purple Pickerelweed, Tulips, Oxeye Daisies, Delphiniums, Cornflowers, Cartwheels, Lilly of the Valley, Poppies, Rose Bushes and Dandelions can be found here too.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/hummingbird)Hummingbirds$(/l) like to live in this place because they have a lot of flowers to pollinate.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Flower Forest$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
